room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
room_address: 5041 W Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy Kissimmee, FL 34746
room_description:
Tonight, you and your paranormal team are about to enter The Pleasant Home for the Insane for the first time since it closed its doors over forty years ago after a rather unpleasant incident. Throughout the years, there were many reports of strange, unexplained noises in the hallways, screams in the night, locked doors opening mysteriously, and sightings of malicious entities roaming the grounds.
You are there to conduct an investigation in the very same room of a patient by the name of Victoria Sneed to determine her fate. As you and your team are investigating Victoriaâ€™s abandoned room in hopes to make contact with her, the door slams shut and locks you in from the outside. Unstable in life and unstable in death, the spirits here are angry and restless and you are now entering their world.
